name: Too hot for a jumper
description:
A game about getting dressed in appropriate clothing for Melbourne weather. 

Thanks to: 

InspectorJ of Freesound.org for "Rain on window, interior" and "Door open" sounds

jmbphilmes of Freesound.org for "Rain heavy 2 (rural)" sound

bublbastre of Freesound.org for "Indoors room tone" sound

221227 of Freesound.org for "sunny day ambience" sound 

DaniloSFX of Freesound.org for "Thunder clap" sound 

ZoviPoland of Freesound.org for "clothes drop" sound 

Shaun Spalding for Sine wave code
